description: *Q: Is there a specific template for the daily plans and tasks files?**
section: **Session 3: VS Code & Daily Reporting Support** (with Dama _4pm)
name: Q: Is there a specific
description_original: *Q: Is there a specific template for the daily plans and tasks files?**

description: *A:** Yes. You can find the template in the `Week 1` > `Folder 05` > `Daily` folder. You can simply copy and paste this structure into your new daily file.
section: **Session 3: VS Code & Daily Reporting Support** (with Dama _4pm)
name: A: Yes. You can find
description_original: *A:** Yes. You can find the template in the `Week 1` > `Folder 05` > `Daily` folder. You can simply copy and paste this structure into your new daily file.
